thiefworld.agents

Class Hunter

  • java.lang.Object
    • thiefworld.agents.Agent
      • thiefworld.agents.ActiveAgent
        • thiefworld.agents.Hunter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, sim.engine.Steppable

    public class Hunter
extends ActiveAgent
    A hunter that collects food from a meat source.
    Author:
    Stefan Adrian Boronea
    See Also:
